title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.24 - Correction of errors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.24 - Correction of errors

State Regulations

When a hearing decision has ordered the correction or
modification of a departmental action, a payment must be made to the appellant
to cover the full amount to which he/she is entitled if an overpayment was
improperly recovered and any sanction must be revised in accordance with the
decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
519.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
